statements: SELECT * FROM lighting_design;
SELECT fixture_type, fixture_brand FROM lighting_design WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT fixture_brand, fixture_specifications FROM lighting_design ORDER BY fixture_brand DESC;
SELECT fixture_type, fixture_brand, fixture_specifications FROM lighting_design WHERE client_id = 456 ORDER BY fixture_type ASC, fixture_brand ASC;
SELECT fixture_id, fixture_type, fixture_brand, fixture_specifications FROM lighting_design WHERE fixture_type = 'Ceiling Light';
SELECT * FROM lighting_design WHERE fixture_type = 'LED' AND client_id = 1;
SELECT fixture_brand, fixture_type, fixture_specifications FROM lighting_design WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT fixture_id, fixture_type, installation_instructions FROM lighting_design WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY fixture_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_design WHERE fixture_type LIKE 'Fluorescent%' AND client_id = 4 ORDER BY fixture_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM lighting_design WHERE fixture_brand IN ('Philips', 'GE');
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures;
SELECT fixture_name, power_consumption FROM lighting_fixtures ORDER BY fixture_name ASC;
SELECT fixture_name, power_consumption FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE power_consumption > 50;
SELECT fixture_name, color_temperature FROM lighting_fixtures ORDER BY color_temperature DESC;
SELECT instruction_id, instruction_details FROM installation_instructions;
SELECT fixture_id, fixture_name, power_consumption, color_temperature FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE color_temperature < 5000 ORDER BY fixture_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures INNER JOIN installation_instructions ON lighting_fixtures.fixture_id = installation_instructions.fixture_id WHERE power_consumption > 50 ORDER BY fixture_id ASC;
SELECT fixture_name, power_consumption FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE color_temperature = 4000 OR power_consumption < 30 ORDER BY power_consumption DESC, fixture_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM installation_instructions INNER JOIN lighting_fixtures ON lighting_fixtures.fixture_id = installation_instructions.fixture_id WHERE instruction_id = 3;
SELECT fixture_id, COUNT(instruction_id) AS num_instructions FROM installation_instructions GROUP BY fixture_id HAVING num_instructions > 1 ORDER BY fixture_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixture;
SELECT fixture_id, fixture_name, wattage FROM lighting_fixture WHERE wattage > 50;
SELECT client_name, consultation_date FROM client_consultation ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, client_name FROM client_consultation WHERE consultation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT fixture_id, steps FROM installation_instruction WHERE length(steps) > 50;
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixture WHERE wattage > 50 ORDER BY fixture_name DESC
SELECT fixture_id, fixture_name FROM lighting_fixture WHERE color_temperature < 3000
SELECT * FROM installation_instruction ORDER BY fixture_id, steps DESC
SELECT client_name, consultation_date, fixture_name FROM client_consultation JOIN lighting_fixture ON client_consultation.fixture_id = lighting_fixture.fixture_id

SELECT client_name, consultation_date, fixture_name, color_temperature FROM client_consultation JOIN lighting_fixture ON client_consultation.fixture_id = lighting_fixture.fixture_id WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures;
SELECT brand, model, color_temperature FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE wattage > 50;
SELECT * FROM installation_instructions ORDER BY warranty_duration DESC;
SELECT client_name, notes FROM client_consultations WHERE designer='John Smith';
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE wattage > 50 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT brand, model, color_temperature FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE model LIKE '%2%' ORDER BY color_temperature DESC;
SELECT id, instructions, warranty_duration FROM installation_instructions WHERE warranty_duration >= 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_consultations WHERE consultation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, budget, client_id, designer_id FROM projects WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE type = 'Ceiling'
SELECT name, wattage FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE price > 100
SELECT id, type FROM lighting_fixtures ORDER BY wattage DESC
SELECT * FROM installation_instructions ORDER BY fixture_id
SELECT * FROM client_consultations WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM lighting_fixtures WHERE type = 'Ceiling' ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT c.name AS client_name, con.name AS consultant_name, cc.meeting_date FROM clients c JOIN client_consultations cc ON c.id = cc.client_id JOIN consultants con ON cc.consultant_id = con.id WHERE cc.meeting_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT l.name, l.type, i.instructions FROM lighting_fixtures l LEFT JOIN installation_instructions i ON l.id = i.fixture_id WHERE l.wattage > 50
SELECT * FROM consultants WHERE expertise LIKE '%LED%'

SELECT c.name AS client_name, c.company, count(cc.id) AS consultation_count FROM clients c LEFT JOIN client_consultations cc ON c.id = cc.client_id GROUP BY c.name, c.company ORDER BY consultation_count DESC
